channel.title: Comments on: SQL Server 2008 R2 Editions Pricing Announced
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Natas
item.dc:creator: Natas
item.content:encoded:
SQL Server 2008 R2 Parallel Data Warehouse Edition

now pronounce that 5 times

Who comes up with these names..it is almost as bad as Microsoft Visual Studio Team System 2008 Database Edition GDR R2

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.content:encoded:
Developer was always the Enterprise Edition without the license. I assume Developer will have all the capabilities of Parallel Data Warehouse and Datacenter editions

Express should be like Standard but limited to size of DB, proc (and RAM if I remember correctly)

Remember that some of these edition you will only be able to buy already configured on a machine.

item.title: By: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.dc:creator: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.description: What about Developer and Express editions - I don't see them listed on that site
item.content:encoded: What about Developer and Express editions – I don’t see them listed on that site
